text: ས་བཟང་མ་ཏི་པཎ་ཆེན་གྱི་གསུང་འབུམ། The Collected Works of Mati Panchen 瑪德班欽大師全集
en: The Collected Works of Mati Panchen

nodes.en: Volume 1, ༼ཀ༽
dam pa'i chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i 'grel ba shes bya rab gsal snang ba'i dkar chag
Volume 2, ༼ཁ༽
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i bsdus don bzhugs lags so//
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par bshad pa gzhung don rab gsal snang ba bzhugs so//
Volume 3, ༼ག༽
dris lan blang dor rab gsal snang ba'i gzhung rnam par dag pa'i yi ge lung dang mthun pa bzhugs so//
dris lan blang dor rab gsal snang ba yi 'grel bshad rnam dag lung dang mthun pa bzhugs/
sa bzang ma tis mdzad pa'i blo sbyong don bdun ma'i 'grel pa rab gsal snang ba bzhugs/
Volume 4, ༼ང༽
theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan gyi rnam par bshad pa theg chen rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 5, ༼ཅ༽
theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos kyi rnam par bshad pa nges don rab gsal snang ba bzhugs so//
Volume 6, ༼ཆ༽
sa bzang ma ti paṇḍi tas mdzad pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos ka lā pa'i mdo'i rnam bshad legs sbyar rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 7, ༼ཇ༽
chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstod pa nyid kyi rgyud sde dang lag len gyi bka' babs sa bzang ma ti paṇḍi tas mdzad pa bzhugs so//
sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i 'khrid rim gyi sdom bzhugs so//
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i spyi chings le'u dang mdor bsdus so sos brjod bya'i khyad par 'di tsam ston zhes pa bzhugs/
khams le'i dka' ba'i gnas rnams kyi 'phrang sgrol gyi man ngag dang nang le'i dka' ba'i gnas rnams kyi 'phrang sgrol gyi man ngag rnams bzhugs pa lags so/ /
lnga bsdus nyung gsal sgron me bzhugs so/ /
chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyud sde dang lag len gyi bka' babs sa bzang ma ti paṇḍi tas mdzad pa'i blo gros seng ge'i dris lan bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i thig tshad gsal byed bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gong ma bzhi'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por slob ma yongs su smin par byed pa'i cho ga'i rim pa dbang don rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa lam mchog rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub cing mchod pa dang / bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga lag len rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhi rgyas rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rim gnyis rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gshin rje gshed dmar po'i bskyed rdzogs kyi man ngag bzhugs so/ /
dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga de nyid rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhi rgyas rab gsal snang ba zhes bya bzhugs/
dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga lag len rab gsal snang ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i mngon par rtogs pa rab gsal snang ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal mgon po nag po chen po lcam dral gyi byung tshul dbu legs par bzhugs so/ /
chos spyod rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba'o/ /
dzam bha lha la chu sbyin pa/
phyi'i bsngo ba'i bstan bcos bar ma rab gsal snang ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 8, ༼ཉ༽
badzra ā tsarya kri yā sa mutstsha ya/
